This code is bogus!
It doesn't hndle corectly the Attribute owner...

As far as I know the org.apache.crimson.tree.AttributeSet, mentioned in your stack trace, is not included in the eRCP delivery...

You should get an AttributeMap from the org.eclipse.ercp.xml.dom package instead... 

Could you check out your class path?

Thanks

I hope it is enough information.
